overview:
A member of EQAL since its founding in 2008, Rachel has worked in numerous capacities throughout the evolution of the company. Currently, Rachel is serving as Vice President of EQAL’s Celebrity Influencer Networks, overseeing the day to day operations and content on a number of EQAL’s media properties, and also working closely on long term content and growth strategy for EQAL’s growing roster of celebrity partners.

Originally from Sacramento, Rachel holds a BA in English from the University of California Santa Barbara. Having seen EQAL from the start, she is excited by what it has accomplished and where it’s headed next.
